text: The 1895 New York Giants season was the franchise's 13th season. The team finished in ninth place in the National League with a 66-65 record, 21.5 games behind the Baltimore Orioles. == Regular season == === Season standings === right === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
